reporter-output.line: Enter 'admin@publisher.nbcuni.com' in the 'Email Address' text box.
Click the 'Menu' link to show the navigation menu items.
Click the 'Media: thePlatform mpx settings' link.
Check if the 'Connect to MPX' button is present. If not then MPX has not been previously enabled.
Click the 'Media: thePlatform mpx settings' link.
Get all the selected import account options and store to a list.
Click the 'DB TV manage file display' link.
Un-check the ' Pub MPX Video (Deprecated)' checkbox
Select the 'AutomationPlayer2' player from the 'Pub MPX Video Player for Account...' drop down list.
Verify success message of 'Your settings have been saved.' is present.
Click the first search title link in the search result set.
Verify the mpx video player frame is present.
Verify the mpx video player frame source does NOT contain 'embed'.
Click the 'DB TV manage file display' link.
Check the ' Pub MPX Video (Deprecated)' checkbox
Verify success message of 'Your settings have been saved.' is present.
Select the 'AutomationPlayer2' player from the 'Pub MPX Video Player for Account...' drop down list.
Cache was cleared on test failure
